description:
Shirahoshi reveals that she knew the truth about her mother`s murder all along, and Luffy makes a bone-crushing entrance when the princess needs him most!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes de Shirahoshi. Luffy entre enfin en scène !
Shirahoshi no Namida! Luffy Tsui ni Toujou
Shirahoshi`s Tears! Luffy Finally Shows Up!
¡las lagrimas de shirahoshi! luffy llega al campo de batalla
しらほしの涙! ルフィ遂に登場
